name: Extreme Cargo Truck Driving 3D
description:
Heavy driving is here to drive extreme cargo truck driving to transport goods and woods. Drive as an expert and park carefully to final point. Drive to show experience and realistic driving oppertunities. Travel accross famous long drive roads where is no traffic rush. Control the steering pick up products and drop up the point shown in the map. Pick up iron goods that are so heavy and expert driving skills require to transport them. Loading and unloading is not a big issue and also it is not your duty. A tough driving experience is to drive from jungle so drive excellent to be the best driver of this modern driving game.
You have to drive big wheel truck no metter big trucker is offroad or on the road. Race the cargo truck and park accurately. Safetly parking will give you rewards. Secrure parking is a complete task sign for you and a ticket to prove you a best driver of big wheel world. Drifting is impossible and on the truck it is much more impossible so be cool and simulate the heavy cargo to drop out carrying goods, luggage and load iron goods. Every next level is intrusting and addictive then previous one. Extreme fantastic truck driving game for you. Your job is to supply goods and try to deliver every products. This Euro truck driver have to drive from the jungle view also.
Enjoy the big transportation mission & extreme trucker trip. This road runner truck is the best vehicle to drive from hilly mountain driving arena. Avoid to demage this carrier dangerous transporter truck to drive towards parking destination place. Enjoy different environment with different weather conditions fun. Enjoy the twist and turn roads to enjoy real driving and be the responsible driver. Smooth steering control to know how tough is a driving duty. Transport the forest woods / iron goods on time so that these woods and iron could be useful on time. Try to install this cargo truck driving game and enjoy it's real fun of driving big trailer. Drive and cross nation roads and highway track. Get skills certificate of heavy driving duty callenge. Transport the luggage on time otherwise your job will be missed.
